quest: The first people to live in Britain were hunter-gatherers, in what we call the Stone Age.
quest_zh: 在我們所謂的石器時代，第一個住在英國的人是狩獵採集者。

quest: The Romans remained in Britain for 300 years.
quest_zh: 羅馬人在英國保留了300年。

quest: By about AD 700, Anglo-Saxon kingdoms were established in Britain.
quest_zh: 到公元700年，英國建立了盎格魯撒克遜王國。

quest: The Norman Conquest was the first  successful foreign invasion of England and led to many changes in government and social structures in England.
quest_zh: 諾曼（Norman）征服是英格蘭首次成功的外國入侵，導致了英格蘭政府和社會結構的許多變化。

quest: The period after the Norman Conquest up until about 1485 is called the Middle Ages was a time of almost constant war.
quest_zh: 諾曼征服直到1485年左右的時期被稱為中世紀，這是一個幾乎持續的戰爭的時期。

quest: The Black Death killed one fifth of the population of England and a similar proportion in Scotland and Wales.
quest_zh: 黑人死亡殺死了英格蘭人口的五分之一，在蘇格蘭和威爾士造成了類似的比例。

quest: The Magna Carta established the idea that even the king was subject to the law.
quest_zh: 大憲章確定了即使是國王也受到法律約束的想法。

quest: By 1600, in England, official documents were being written in English, and English had become the preferred language of the royal court and Parliament.
quest_zh: 到1600年，在英格蘭，正在用英語撰寫官方文件，英語已成為皇家法院和議會的首選語言。

quest: In 1485, a civil war was begun to decide who should be king of England. It was fought between the supporters of two families: the House of Lancaster and the House of York.
quest_zh: 1485年，內戰開始決定誰應該是英格蘭國王。它是在兩個家庭的支持者之間進行的：蘭開斯特之家和約克之家。

quest: Henry VIII was most famous for breaking away from the Church of Rome and marrying six times.
quest_zh: 亨利八世（Henry VIII）以脫離羅馬教堂並嫁給六次而聞名。

quest: Elizabeth became one of the most popular monarchs in English history, particularly after 1588, when the English defeated the Spanish Armada.
quest_zh: 伊麗莎白成為英國歷史上最受歡迎的君主之一，尤其是在1588年之後，英國人擊敗了西班牙艦隊。

quest: The 'King James Version' or the 'Authorised Version' was not the first English Bible but is a version which continues to be used in many Protestant churches today.
quest_zh: “國王詹姆斯版本”或“授權版本”不是第一個英語聖經，而是當今許多新教教堂繼續使用的版本。

quest: In May 1660, Parliament invited Charles II to come back from exile in the Netherlands. He was crowned King Charles II of England, Wales, Scotland and Ireland.
quest_zh: 1660年5月，議會邀請查爾斯二世從荷蘭流放回來。他被加冕為英格蘭，威爾士，蘇格蘭和愛爾蘭國王查爾斯二世。

quest: Charles II was interested in science. During his reign, the Royal Society was formed to promote 'natural knowledge'.
quest_zh: 查爾斯二世對科學感興趣。在統治期間，皇家學會旨在促進“自然知識”。

quest: It was called the 'Glorious Revolution' because there a rapid development of economy of the UK.
quest_zh: 之所以被稱為“光榮革命”，是因為英國經濟的迅速發展。

quest: The Bill of Rights, 1719, confirmed the rights of Parliament and the limits of the king's power.
quest_zh: 《人權法案》（1719年）確認了議會的權利和國王權力的限制。

quest: The first Jews to come to Britain since the Middle Ages settled in London in 1656.
quest_zh: 自1656年中世紀以來，第一個來英國的猶太人來到英國。

quest: The Act of Governments, known as the Treaty of Governments in Scotland, was therefore agreed in 1707, creating the Kingdom of Great Britain.
quest_zh: 因此，1707年達成了政府的行為，稱為蘇格蘭政府條約，建立了英國王國。

quest: The first man to be called 'Prime Minister' was Sir Robert Walpole, who was Prime Minister from 1721 to 1742.
quest_zh: 第一個被稱為“總理”的人是羅伯特·沃爾波爾爵士，他於1721年至1742年擔任總理。

quest: During the 19th century, new ideas about politics, philosophy and science were developed. This is often called 'the Enlightenment'
quest_zh: 在19世紀，關於政治，哲學和科學的新思想得到了發展。這通常稱為“啟蒙”

quest: The Industrial Revolution was the rapid development of industry in Britain in the 18th and 19th centuries.
quest_zh: 工業革命是18世紀和19世紀英國工業的快速發展。

quest: In 1833 the Emancipation Act abolished slavery throughout the British Empire.
quest_zh: 1833年，《解放法》廢除了整個大英帝國的奴隸制。

quest: In 1783, 13 American colonies declared their independence, stating that people had a right to establish their own governments.
quest_zh: 1783年，13個美國殖民地宣布獨立，並說人們有權建立自己的政府。

quest: During the 18th century, Britain fought a number of wars with France.
quest_zh: 在18世紀，英國與法國進行了許多戰爭。

quest: The Union Flag consists of four crosses
quest_zh: 聯盟旗由四個十字架組成

quest: Queen Victoria reigned almost 68 years.
quest_zh: 維多利亞女王統治了將近68年。

quest: During the Victorian period, the British Empire grew to cover all of India, Australia and large parts of Africa.
quest_zh: 在維多利亞時代，大英帝國成長為覆蓋印度，澳大利亞和非洲大部分地區。

quest: In 1846, the Corn Laws prevented the import of cheap grain.
quest_zh: 1846年，玉米法律阻止了廉價穀物的進口。

quest: The Crimean war was fought with France against Turkey
quest_zh: 克里米亞戰爭與法國與土耳其作戰

quest: Queen Victoria introduced the Victoria Gold during the Crimean War.
quest_zh: 維多利亞皇后在克里米亞戰爭期間引入了維多利亞黃金。

quest: As the Middle Class grew, the Reform Act of 1832 greatly increased the number of people with the right to vote.
quest_zh: 隨著中產階級的發展，1832年的《改革法案》大大增加了擁有投票權的人數。

quest: The phrase 'the Dunkirk spirit' is still used today to describe Britons pulling together in the face of adversity.
quest_zh: 如今，“敦刻爾克精神”一詞仍用於描述面對逆境的英國人。

quest: Clement Atlee led the establishment of the NHS.
quest_zh: 克萊門特·阿特利（Clement Atlee）領導了NHS的成立。

quest: In 1947, independence was granted to nine countries, including India, Pakistan and Ceylon (now Sri Lanka).
quest_zh: 1947年，獨立授予包括印度，巴基斯坦和錫蘭（現為斯里蘭卡）在內的九個國家。

quest: During the 1950s, further immigration was encouraged for economic reasons.
quest_zh: 在1950年代，由於經濟原因，鼓勵進一步的移民。

quest: The jet engine was developed in Britain in the 1890s by Sir Robert Watson-Watt
quest_zh: 這款噴氣發動機是在1890年代由羅伯特·沃森·瓦特爵士在英國開發的

quest: Sir Ian Wilmot, a British inventor, invented the hovercraft in the 1950s.
quest_zh: 英國發明家伊恩·威爾莫特爵士在1950年代發明了氣墊船。

quest: The 1970s were also a time of serious unrest in Northern Ireland.
quest_zh: 1970年代也是北愛爾蘭嚴重動蕩的時期。

quest: UK, West Germany, France, Belgium, Italy and the Netherlands formed the European Economic Community (EEC) in 1957.
quest_zh: 英國，西德，法國，比利時，意大利和荷蘭在1957年成立了歐洲經濟群落（EEC）。

quest: Margaret Thatcher, Britain's first woman Prime Minister belonged to the Conservative Party.
quest_zh: 瑪格麗特·撒切爾（Margaret Thatcher），英國的第一位女總理屬於保守黨。

quest: The Labour and Liberal Democrat parties formed a coalition in 2010.
quest_zh: 勞工和自由民主黨在2010年成立了一個聯盟。

quest: Nearly 20% of the population has a parent or grandparent born outside the UK.
quest_zh: 近20％的人口有一個父母或祖父母出生在英國以外的地方。

quest: The longest distance on the mainland is from John O'Groats on the north coast of Scotland to Land's End in the south-west corner of England. It is about 870 kilometres.
quest_zh: 大陸上最長的距離是從蘇格蘭北部海岸的約翰·奧格羅斯（John O'Groats）到英格蘭西南角的陸地末端。大約是870公里。

quest: Northern Ireland and Scotland have their own banknotes, which are valid everywhere in the UK.
quest_zh: 北愛爾蘭和蘇格蘭有自己的鈔票，在英國各地都有有效。

quest: In the UK many people speak Welsh, Scottish Gaelic and Irish Gaelic.
quest_zh: 在英國，許多人會說威爾士，蘇格蘭蓋爾語和愛爾蘭蓋爾語。

quest: The UK population in 1901 was 20 million
quest_zh: 1901年的英國人口是2000萬

quest: Women in Britain today make up about half of the workforce.
quest_zh: 今天，英國的婦女構成了勞動力的一半。

quest: In the Citizenship Survey, 21% of people said that they had no religion.
quest_zh: 在公民身份調查中，有21％的人說他們沒有宗教信仰。

quest: The official Church of the state is the Church of England called the Anglican Church in Scotland.
quest_zh: 國家官方教會是英格蘭教堂，稱為蘇格蘭的英國國教教堂。

quest: St Andrew's Day is on 17 March
quest_zh: 聖安德魯節是3月17日

quest: Only Scotland and Northern Ireland have their patron saint's day as an official holiday
quest_zh: 只有蘇格蘭和北愛爾蘭作為正式假期的守護神日

quest: Boxing Day is the day before Christmas Day and is a public holiday.
quest_zh: 節禮日是聖誕節前一天，是一個公共假期。

quest: Father's Day is the second Sunday in June. Children send cards or buy gifts for their fathers.
quest_zh: 父親節是六月的第二個星期日。孩子們為父親發送卡片或購買禮物。

quest: The UK has hosted the Olympic Games on two occasions
quest_zh: 英國曾兩次舉辦奧運會

quest: Rugby originated in England in the early 19th century and is very popular in the UK today.
quest_zh: 橄欖球起源於19世紀初的英格蘭，今天在英國非常受歡迎。

quest: A British sailor, Sir Francis Chichester, was the first person to sail single-handed around the world
quest_zh: 英國水手弗朗西斯·奇切斯特爵士是第一個在世界各地航行的人

quest: The Proms is an four-week summer season of orchestral classical music
quest_zh: 舞會是一個為期四周的管弦樂古典音樂的夏季

quest: The Mercury Music Prize is awarded each September for the best album from the UK and Ireland.
quest_zh: 每年9月，獲得英國和愛爾蘭的最佳專輯。

quest: The Turner Prize was established in 2004 and celebrates contemporary art.
quest_zh: 特納獎成立於2004年，並慶祝當代藝術。

quest: Ulster Fry is a welsh traditional food
quest_zh: 阿爾斯特·弗萊（Ulster Fry）是威爾士傳統食物

quest: Films were first shown publicly in the UK in 1896
quest_zh: 電影於1896年首次在英國公開放映

quest: The ability to laugh at other people is an important part of the UK character
quest_zh: 嘲笑他人的能力是英國角色的重要組成部分

quest: Blind people can get a 50% discount on their TV licence
quest_zh: 盲人可以在電視執照上獲得50％的折扣

quest: Pubs are usually open during the day from 11.00 am (12 noon on Sundays)
quest_zh: 酒吧通常在白天從上午11.00（週日中午12點）開放

quest: People under 18 are not allowed to participate in the National Lottery.
quest_zh: 18歲以下的人不允許參加國家彩票。

quest: All dogs in public places must wear a collar showing the name and address of the owner
quest_zh: 公共場所的所有狗都必須佩戴衣領，顯示所有者的名稱和地址

quest: The Lake District is England's largest national park
quest_zh: 湖區是英格蘭最大的國家公園

quest: The UK is a parliamentary democracy with the monarch as head of state.
quest_zh: 英國是君主作為國家元首的議會民主國家。

quest: In the 1830s and 1840s, a group called the Chartists campaigned for every woman to have a vote
quest_zh: 在1830年代和1840年代，一個名為Chartists的小組競選每個女人進行投票

quest: In 2010 Queen Elizabeth II celebrated her Diamond Jubilee (50 years as queen)
quest_zh: 2010年，伊麗莎白二世皇后慶祝了她的鑽石禧年（50歲時擔任女王）

quest: The first verse of the UK National Anthem begins with 'God save the Queen'
quest_zh: 英國國歌的第一節經文始於“上帝拯救女王”

quest: Voters in each constituency elect their member of Parliament (MP) in a General Election.
quest_zh: 每個選區的選民在大選中選舉其議會議員（MP）。

quest: Peers (Sitting in the House of Lords) inherit their titles now
quest_zh: 同齡人（坐在上議院中）現在繼承了他們的頭銜

quest: Debates in the House of Commons are chaired by the Prime Minister.
quest_zh: 下議院的辯論由總理主持。

quest: If an MP dies or resigns, there will be a fresh General election
quest_zh: 如果國會議員去世或辭職，將舉行新的大選

quest: The Prime Minister can be changed if the MPs in the governing party decide to do so
quest_zh: 如果理事會中的國會議員決定這樣做，總理可以更改

quest: The Prime Minister appoints about 80 senior MPs to become ministers in charge of departments.
quest_zh: 總理任命約80名高級議員成為負責部門的部長。

quest: Home Secretary is responsible for immigration
quest_zh: 內政大臣負責移民

quest: The second-largest party in the House of Commons is called the opposition.
quest_zh: 下議院的第二大政黨被稱為反對派。

quest: Anyone aged 21 or over can stand for election as an MP
quest_zh: 21歲或以上的任何人都可以代表選舉

quest: The Government policy try to influence pressure and lobby groups
quest_zh: 政府政策試圖影響壓力和遊說團體

quest: There has been a Welsh Assembly and a Scottish Parliament since 1999
quest_zh: 自1999年以來一直舉行威爾士議會和蘇格蘭議會

quest: The Welsh Assembly has the power to make laws in Health Services
quest_zh: 威爾士議會有權制定衛生服務法律

quest: The National Assembly for Wales can pass laws (in specific areas) without the agreement of the UK Parliament
quest_zh: 國民議會可以通過英國議會達成協議，可以通過法律（在特定領域）

quest: Proceedings in Parliament are broadcast on television and published in official reports called Hansard
quest_zh: 議會議會在電視上播出，並在名為Hansard的官方報告中發表

quest: To be able to vote in a parliamentary, local or European election, you must have your name on the electoral register
quest_zh: 為了能夠在議會，地方或歐洲大選中投票，您必須在選舉登記冊上有自己的名字

quest: When you arrive at the polling station, the staff will ask for your name and address.
quest_zh: 當您到達投票站時，工作人員會要求您的姓名和地址。

quest: The Queen is the ceremonial head of the Commonwealth, which currently has 27 member states
quest_zh: 女王是英聯邦的儀式負責人，目前有27個成員國

quest: The Council of Europe has the power to make European laws
quest_zh: 歐洲理事會有權制定歐洲法律

quest: The UN Security Council has five permanent members
quest_zh: 聯合國安理會有五個常任成員

quest: Nato stands for The North American Treaty Organization
quest_zh: 北約代表北美條約組織

quest: It is a criminal offence to sell tobacco products to anyone under the age of 18
quest_zh: 向18歲以下的任何人出售菸草產品是刑事犯罪

quest: In November 2012, the public elected Police and Crime Commissioners (PCCs) in England and Wales.
quest_zh: 2012年11月，公眾當選英格蘭和威爾士的警察和犯罪專員（PCC）。

quest: A jury has 12 members in the UK
quest_zh: 陪審團在英國有12名成員

quest: In Wales a system called the Children's Hearings System is used to deal with children and young people who have committed an offence.
quest_zh: 在威爾士，一種名為“兒童聽證會”系統的系統用於與犯罪的兒童和年輕人打交道。

quest: The small claims procedure is used for claims of less than £3,000 in England and Wales
quest_zh: 小額索賠程序用於英格蘭和威爾士的索賠少於3,000英鎊

quest: People have to pay tax on pensions in the UK
quest_zh: 人們必須對英國的退休金繳稅

quest: The money raised from National Insurance Contributions is used to pay for the state retirement pension and education
quest_zh: 國家保險捐款籌集的資金用於支付州退休金和教育

quest: Drivers can use their driving licence until they are 75 years old.
quest_zh: 駕駛員可以使用他們的駕駛執照，直到75歲。

quest: FGM and forced marriage are legal in the UK
quest_zh: 女性女以及強迫婚姻在英國是合法的
